name: Universal hero 2 - Global hero
description:
Universal hero tweak by returnlearn - New graphics, sounds, difficulty. Included Joy2Key for controls.

Re-upload with permission

Remake by Leigh Prosho (Kryten)

V1.0 – 13th October 2004

Written using Blitz Basic 3D v1.85

Original game published by Mastertronic 1986

Original game authors: Stuart Middleton, Ray Tredoux & Chris Harvey of Xcel
